message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe this price reflects the value it will bring to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and the value I can get from the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,500 is too low for me.  Would you consider $11,000? It's a fair compromise.
I understand your compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,750? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
